snippet: Contested ballots have held up the final results of a runoff election to determine which union will represent pickers and packers at the nation's largest strawberry grower.    California labor officials were reviewing the ballots of the nearly 1,4...
lead_paragraph: Contested ballots have held up the final results of a runoff election to determine which union will represent pickers and packers at the nation's largest strawberry grower. California labor officials were reviewing the ballots of the nearly 1,400 workers at the Coastal Berry Company who turned out Thursday and Friday to choose between the United Farm Workers and a rival union, the Coastal Berry of California Farm Worker Committee.
abstract: Constested ballots delay final results of runoff election to determine whether United Farm Workers or Coastal Berry of California Farm Worker Committee will represent workers at Coastal Berry, nation's largest strawberry grower (S)

headline.main: Disputed Ballots Stall Tally for Berry Union
